description: This Java class 'ResumeController' provides REST API endpoints for CRUD operations on resume resources, including listing, fetching by ID, deleting, and patching resumes. It leverages Spring Boot annotations for REST mapping, OpenAPI annotations for API documentation, and integrates with a repository for database operations.

classes.name: ResumeController
classes.description: REST controller handling CRUD operations for resumes related to authenticated users.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of resume objects associated with the current authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific resume by its ID, ensuring it belongs to the authenticated user.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a resume by ID after verifying ownership.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Updates the full text of a resume specified by ID after ownership verification.
